mapper.select: SELECT MARKET_BNO, MEMBER_ID, ALPHABET, CREATE_DATE, SELLING_STATUS, TITLE FROM ALPHABET_MARKET JOIN MEMBER ON(WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REF_CLASS = #{classNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT MARKET_BNO, MEMBER_ID, ALPHABET, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, SELLING_STATUS, TITLE, REF_CLASS FROM ALPHABET_MARKET JOIN MEMBER ON(WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE MARKET_BNO = #{bno}

SELECT REPLY_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NO, REPLY_ALPHABET, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, REF_MARKET, REPLY_SELECTED FROM ALPHABET_REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_MARKET = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALPHABET_REPLY JOIN MEMBER ON(REPLY_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_MARKET = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALPHABET_MARKET VALUES(SEQ_MARKET_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{alphabet}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{classNo}, #{title})
INSERT INTO ALPHABET_REPLY VALUES(SEQ_MARKET_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{alphabet}, #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, #{refMarket}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT MARKET_BNO FROM (SELECT MARKET_BNO FROM ALPHABET_MARKET WHERE REF_CLASS = #{classNo} AND WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
